attributes.action: Declare a annual national holiday celebrating the NHS and all NHS workers
attributes.additional_details:
Never again will we ever accept an underfunded NHS.
We will never forget the sacrifices putting their  own lives at risk all the NHS staff  have made for the people and the NHS.
attributes.background: The current coronavirus pandemic has shown us that all health service workers are and continue to make great sacrifices to defeat this deadly virus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for a similar action: 

Create a new Bank Holiday in recognition of the NHS and all its amazing workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882 

Bank holiday to thank those who helped during the COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364 

Introduce a 'one off' bank holiday after covid-19 pandemic to boost morale: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304513 

Designate a day for the recognition of our NHS and all Emergency Services.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308614

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
